item.title: Coming soon
item.description: What to expect? Seriously, who still writes blogs in 2021? Isn’t that more like an early 2000s thing? I tried and gave up on this a while back already. Still, every now and again this urge to go on the internet and rant about stuff I experience in my daily work life itches me in the back of my head. “If you want to rant, why don’t you go on social media?

item.title: About
item.description: Script Terror is a blog about agile software engineering by Norman Steger. Norman is a full stack software engineer with a passion for JavaScript and TypeScript based technology stacks living in Regensburg, Germany. He is most passionate about: user experience agile methodology test driven development behavior driven development Currently he works as a consultant at Comsysto Reply GmbH, where he helps customers in industries like automotive, telecommunications, insurance, transportation or finance to build digital experiences for tomorrow.
